data.eml:eml: Revision of the species of Elaphropeza Macquart, 1827 (Diptera: Hybotidae, Tachydromiinae) from Amazon Basin and some remarks about E. ciliatocosta (Bezzi, 1904)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Freitas-Silva, Rafael A. P., Ale-Rocha, Rosaly (2009): Revision of the species of Elaphropeza Macquart, 1827 (Diptera: Hybotidae, Tachydromiinae) from Amazon Basin and some remarks about E. ciliatocosta (Bezzi, 1904). Zootaxa 2245: 32-46, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.190681
